entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI III 1987. Financial situation and household management practices.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-B33: TÁRKI III 1987. Financial situation and household management practices.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Sik, Endre
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Socialist Labor Party Central Committee Social Sciences Institute
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-02-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: structure of household expenditures and related opinions; consumption habits; economic behaviour and financial situation; the way they got the present dwelling; the head of family's and spouse's income, bargaining position in the labour market, participation in the second economy or family farming; household work, work exchange; housing conditions and financial situation of adult children; time budget
entry.dcterms:subject: consumption/consumer behavior
economic systems and development
family life, marriage, relationship
income, property and savings
household
survey data
cross-section
Family heads sample from the subsamples of TÁRKI basic data survey I-II-III.
face-to-face interview
A
